abstract: On hearing that his female challenger did not pose nude for Cosmopolitan, as he did, Senator Scott Brown says, "Thank God."
snippet: On hearing that his female challenger did not pose nude for Cosmopolitan, as he did, Senator Scott Brown says, "Thank God."
lead_paragraph: 4:56 p.m. | Updated When a student at a recent United States Senate debate in Massachusetts asked Elizabeth Warren how she paid for college, pointing out that Senator Scott Brown had posed nude in Cosmopolitan magazine to help pay his law school bills, Ms. Warren said, jokingly, "I didn't take my clothes off."

headline.main: Nudity Comments Spice Up Senate Battle
